title: Derby in advanced talks to sign Norwich striker Cameron Jerome
description: Derby are in advanced talks to sign Norwich striker Cameron Jerome, Sky Sports News understands.
content: The 31-year-old is potentially available this month, after one goal in 15 Championship games this season.He would become the Rams' fifth striker alongside David Nugent, Darren Bent, Chris Martin and the Sheffield Wednesday loanee Sam Winnall.But Sky Sports News understands there is interest in Chris Martin on loan from Leeds.Jerome has made over 100 appearances and scored 42 goals for the Canaries since signing from Stoke City for in 2014.He began his career at Middlesbrough as a trainee before moving to Cardiff City on a free transfer and then Birmingham for Â£3m.
